Title: Provides penalties for arson and enhancing penalties for criminal mischief against motor vehicle dealerships and manufacturing facilities
Summary: Provides penalties for arson and enhancing penalties for criminal mischief against motor vehicle dealerships and motor vehicle manufacturing facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง150.00, add ยง145.11, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to providing penalties for arson and enhancing penalties for criminal mischief against motor vehicle dealerships and manufacturing facilities
